mapper.select: select organ.id id, organ.lid lid, organ.name name, organ.intro intro from organization organ join organization_relation relation on organ.id = relation.oid where uid = #{uid};
select count(*) from organization_relation where oid = #{id} group by oid
mapper.insert: insert into organization (lid, name, intro) values(#{lid}, #{name}, #{intro})
mapper.select: select u.id uid, u.email email, u.nickname nickname, u.intro intro, u.img img, p.cnt cnt from user u join (select u.uid uid, count(*) cnt from (select uid from organization_relation where oid = #{oid}) u join post p on u.uid = p.uid group by u.uid order by cnt desc limit #{cnt}) p on u.id = p.uid

select u.id uid, u.email email, u.nickname nickname, u.intro intro, u.img img, l.cnt cnt from user u join (select u.uid uid, sum(cnt_like) cnt from (select uid from organization_relation where oid = #{oid}) u join post p on u.uid = p.uid group by u.uid order by cnt desc limit #{cnt}) l on u.id = l.uid
